title: After downloading patch 6.15, i cannot log in, says I have a connection error
body: I have already tried all of the troubleshoot steps on Riot's webpage and I have also tried repairing the patch and completley re-installing the game. It was working fine before this patch. HELP!!!

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble establishing a connection to our authentication servers, and may not necessarily be an issue with your files that would require a re-install.  I'm not sure which troubleshoot steps you've taken, but  our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would be your best bet to getting this fixed up.  Go over these steps, and let me know your results!
